WebGPU-BLAS Example

This example computes matrix-matrix multiplication (sgemm) using WebGPU, future web standard.

When this page is served from milhidaka.github.io, Chrome enables WebGPU without any config until March 2022 (by origin trial).

As of 2022, you need a beta version web browser, such as Chrome Canary, and enable webgpu feature flag (open chrome://flags/#enable-unsafe-webgpu ).

WebGPU of this browser:

Created by @milhidaka Github
